name: RoomskillsSmarthomeDevices
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Roomskills Smarthome Devices provides access on Alexa to the devices configured on the Roomskills.com web site. With the skill you can control the devices via Alexa routines, Alexa voice commands and the Alexa App.

Roomskills supports directly
- devices of the brand AVM FRITZ!BOX Smarthome with the thermostats AVM FRITZ!DECT 300 and 301, the smart plugs FRITZ!DECT 200 and 210 and the light bulb AVM FRITZ!DECT 500. 
- lights, light groups and scenes of the Philips Hue system
- smarte music player from Sonos and the Squeezebox / Logitech Mediaserver system can be controled using Alexa commands or routines. We provide the additional skill Roomskills Musiccontrol, which has a lot more voice commands to control music players. 

In addition devices of the ioBroker Smarthome system can be configured as well. 

The skill requires an account on Roomskills.com and the devices to be setup in advance. Detailed instructions can be found on the Roomskills.com web site.

Have fun setting it up und using it.
